summary.span: 提供回呼 (Callback) 方法來決定 方法應該在何時提前取消執行並停止繪製影像。

span.span: Provides a callback method for deciding when the method should prematurely cancel execution and stop drawing an image.

returns.span: 如果這個方法決定 方法應該提前停止執行，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: This method returns if it decides that the method should prematurely stop execution.
